evidence.text: Motion Hearing set for 6/17/2025 at 03:30 PM in Courtroom 444, 40 Centre Street, New York, NY 10007 before Judge Andrew L. Carter Jr.

In advance of the hearing scheduled for June 17, 2025 at 3:30 p.m., the Court hereby sets the following schedule: Plaintiffs Opening Remarks (7 min.); Defendants Opening Remarks (7 min.); Q&A; Plaintiffs Response (4 min.); Defendants Response (4 min.)

extracted.value: Hearing scheduled for June 17, 2025 at 3:30 PM in Courtroom 444, 40 Centre Street, New York, NY 10007 before Judge Andrew L. Carter Jr.
